    • Field Detail

      • verboseMode

        static boolean verboseMode
        The value is used to decide if verbose information should be print

      • debugMode

        static boolean debugMode
        The value is used to decide if debug information should be print

      • signature

        Include.Signature signature
        The signature type. E.g. timestamp, sign, ...

      • pdfToSign

        java.lang.String pdfToSign
        Path to pdf which get a signature

      • signedPDF

        java.lang.String signedPDF
        Path to output document with generated signature

      • signingReason

        java.lang.String signingReason
        Reason for signing a document.

      • signingLocation

        java.lang.String signingLocation
        Location where a document was signed

      • signingContact

        java.lang.String signingContact
        Person who signed the document

      • distinguishedName

        java.lang.String distinguishedName
        Distinguished name contains information about signer. Needed for ondemand signature

      • msisdn

        java.lang.String msisdn
        Mobile phone number to send a message when signing a document. Needed for signing with mobile id

      • msg

        java.lang.String msg
        Message which will be send to mobile phone with mobile id. Needed for signing with mobile id.

      • language

        java.lang.String language
        Language of the message which will be send to mobile phone with mobile id. Needed for signing with mobile id.

      • propertyFilePath

        java.lang.String propertyFilePath
        Path for properties file. Needed if standard path will not be used.

    • Method Detail

      • printUsage

        public static void printUsage()
        Prints usage

      • printError

        public static void printError(java.lang.String error)
        Prints error message
        Parameters:
        error - Message that should print

      • parseParameters

        private void parseParameters(java.lang.String[] args)
        Parse given parameters. If an error occurs application with exit with code 1. If debug and/or verbose mode is set an error message will be shown
        Parameters:
        args -

      • checkNecessaryParams

        private void checkNecessaryParams()
        Check if needed parameters are given. If not method will print an error and exit with code 1

      • checkUnnecessaryParams

        private void checkUnnecessaryParams()
        This method checks if there are unnecessary parameters. If there are some it will print the usage of parameters and exit with code 1 (e.g. DN is given for signing with timestamp)

      • runSigning

        private void runSigning(java.lang.String[] params)
        Parse given parameters, check if all necessary parameters exist and if there are not unnecessary parameters. If there are problems with parameters application will abort with exit code 1. After all checks are done signing process will start.
        Parameters:
        params -

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method to start AIS. This will parse given parameters e.g. input file, output file etc. and start signature process. Furthermore this method prints error message if signing failed. See usage part in README to know how to use it.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments that will be parsed. See useage part in README for more details.
